<a id="class_VideoStream"></a>

# VideoStream

**Inherits:** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [VideoStreamTheora](class_videostreamtheora.md)

Base resource for video streams.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Base resource type for all video streams. Classes that derive from **VideoStream** can all be used as resource types to play back videos in [VideoStreamPlayer](class_videostreamplayer.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Playing videos](../tutorials/animation/playing_videos.md)

- [Runtime file loading and saving](../tutorials/io/runtime_file_loading_and_saving.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_VideoStream_property_file"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](class_string.md) **file** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#class_VideoStream_property_file)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_file**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_file**\ (\ )

The video file path or URI that this **VideoStream** resource handles.

For [VideoStreamTheora](class_videostreamtheora.md), this filename should be an Ogg Theora video file with the ``.ogv`` extension.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_VideoStream_private_method__instantiate_playback"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[VideoStreamPlayback](class_videostreamplayback.md) **_instantiate_playback**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_VideoStream_private_method__instantiate_playback)

Called when the video starts playing, to initialize and return a subclass of [VideoStreamPlayback](class_videostreamplayback.md).
